Between clues, we may ask you a bonus question for EXTRA ACHIEVEMENTS!

The questions are timed, so answer as fast as you can!
Of course, it's OK to use Google Search to help you!
It\'s time for another trivia question!\n\nGood luck!
An application requires an update to the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t run unless you update the Android Wear app.
This app won\'t work unless you enable Google Play services.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your phone.
This app won\'t run without Google Play services, which are missing from your tablet.
The specified account does not exist on this device. Please choose a different account.
An application requires Google Play services to be enabled.
A data connection is required to connect to Google Play services.
An application requires installation of Google Play services.
An application requires an update for Google Play services.
Unknown issue with Google Play services.
Google Play services, which some of your applications rely on, is not supported by your device. Please contact the manufacturer for assistance.
This app won\'t run unless you update Google Play services.
Allow Ad to create a calendar event?

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.
Todi AppyDays 2014 Hunt\nby Giovanni Laquidara and \nthe Google Developer Group Roma Lazio Abruzzo team

Google Analytics Android SDK version 2.0 beta 4\n\n

Android Google+ like floating action button which reacts on the list view scrolling events. Becomes visible when the list view is scrolled up and invisible when scrolled down.
Return to the GDG desk where you started to claim your prize!

This work uses sounds from Freesound.org:


Chinese Fanfare
 by Nick-Nac
 http://www.freesound.org/people/Nick-Nac/


button select.wav, level up.wav, shoot laser.wav

 by Cabeeno Rossley
"Allow Ad to store image in Picture gallery?"
Welcome to\nAppyDays Hunt, the NFC/QR game at\nTodi AppyDays 2014!
Bugdroid goes to AppyDays, using his G-Map Nav!
But he lost is phone and can\'t find it anymore he needs your help to find it!
Follow the clues by scanning special NFC/QR tags, like this one! You will find them all around the building.
There will be multiple tags at each location, so keep your eyes open!
Are you ready? Your journey awaits...
Press the button below to accept your quest.
Please Sign In with Google+ to continue.
We use Google+ login to record your progress. By signing in, you will be able to get achievements and redeem prizes.\n\nYou may also find your progress displayed on the leaderboard.

string.translation_description: Text on a button that allows a user to make a payment with Google Wallet [CHAR LIMIT=30]

resources.string: There must be something about this tag that could have warned you...

AppyDays Hunt is a game exclusively for Todi AppyDays 2014 attendees...
Oh, and there's a prize at the end.

Ready to play?
